website_summaries.verdict: This feature-rich, flexible summertime sleep system is a must-have for campers looking for cozy comfort.
pros: Perfectly insulated for summer camping above 45 degrees, this bag is easy to pack, unpack and clean
We were impressed by the removable, washable inner liner and its massive California king width
Dual pockets keep pillows in place, and an optional hood cinches down to preserve warmth on chilly nights
cons: Zipper tends to catch easily on the protective draft tubes

customer_reviews.title: You will love it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s massive! And it’s so cozy and comfortable inside. Lots of thick padding, the big puffy edging, the comfy (removable!) liner, this bag has it all. As a double bag, my wife and I love it. Plenty of room, and warm and snoozy. Zipped apart into two bags you have one massive bag for me and one slightly less massive bag for her. There are oversized convenient zippers, a drawstring to cinch the top, and did I mention it’s huge? This double sleeping bag produces long, full nights of rest, proven! We absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Partridge

customer_reviews.title: Great Extras in a Double Sleeping Bag!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Loved all the extras. Pillow pockets and interior zippered pockets (beneath zippered/washable lining). Zippers are very heavy duty. I’m 6’2” and fit perfectly in it with plenary of room. Love the fact I can make two sleeping bags out of one. The carry case is awesome too! Warmed up quite quick while I tested it out. Liner pattern and and faded color is a nice added touch.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: This is the one you want to buy!
customer_reviews.text: I am blown away by how awesome this bag is. It's way larger and cushier than I thought it was going to be. I also own a North Face double sleeping bag and I like this one way better. The King Cove has way more features and is more comfy. I love how it separates into two separate bags and that it has little mesh pockets to keep your pillows in place. I'm excited to get this out camping.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Geertsen

customer_reviews.title: Better Than North Face!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best sleeping bag we have ever used! It is huge and able to fit my wife, child, and myself. I also love how it can convert to two individual sleeping bags. The material is very comfortable and kept us so warm. I can't wait to go camping again to use it! We had a north face sleeping bag before but this is our new favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love that I was able to wash the inside the ...
customer_reviews.text: So excited for this purchase! Opened it the day I got it and tested it out inside. It was so comfy my fiance ended up falling asleep and sleeping in it on my floor the entire night! Lol. Love that I was able to wash the inside the next day nice and easy with the removable lining. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Dan A

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT! I love that it can fit two ...
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get my giant sleeping bag in the mail and.....I LOVE IT! I love that it can fit two people in it if you want or zip into 2 singles. I can't wait to try it out down at Lake Powell and cuddle up with my guy. Genius idea. I really like that it has a removable liner that I can wash separately. I also really love the mesh pillow holder which will hold my pillow in place which is again a genius idea! All in all I love the product!
customer_reviews.author: Kymberly K Mudrow

customer_reviews.title: I really love this sleeping bag
customer_reviews.text: I really love this sleeping bag. It is roomy and well insulated. I was most excited about the washable liner. It is hard to wash normal sleeping bags so a removable liner is a perfect solution. I was impressed with an extra section of padding to covers the zipper to keep out any possible drafts. It was designed smartly to have a section for a pillow that hangs over the actual sleeping bag. The only thing I wish was bigger was the stuff sack. I am very good at folding things to fit back in their original bag but this gave me a run for my money. :) I loved the grey and turquoise color combination.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Lots of great selling points make this much better than my last 2-person bag
customer_reviews.text: The big selling point for me is that this has removable zip-out sheets so you can keep it clean. And it comes with a compression sack, and has pillow pockets. Plus it has a better temperature rating and the two halves can be separate bags too. Really cool bag. I already have a 2-person sleeping bag, but I bought this because all these features make it much better.
customer_reviews.author: Zuma

customer_reviews.title: Big in size, big on quality
customer_reviews.text: Really excited for this bag. I spend summers on many youth camps and with my big frame (6’1” over 245lbs) have struggled to find a bag that would accomodate my shoulders - I’m a side sleeper- and my length. Pic shows a 6’ measuring tape for perspective. This is perfect. Cant wait for camping season. I fit really well. Love that it converts to two bags. Love the built in pillow pockets. Quality zippers. Be aware that It is very bulky (pics show measuring tape at 2’ x 1’ stuffed).
customer_reviews.author: MS.UT

customer_reviews.title: I love that it has a zipper pouch for keys, cell phone, wallets etc.
customer_reviews.text: I had the chance to try this out last night. It was around 38 degrees and I stayed warm and toasty. This bag has plenty of room for two people comfortably. It all seems to be great quality. I love that it has a zipper pouch for keys, cell phone, wallets etc. The zip out washable liner is also a great feature! I’m very happy with the bag and I’m sure you will be as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse L.

customer_reviews.title: 😍😍😍 Best sleeping bag ever!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I try to zip bags together so we can be closer for more warmth and it never works out that well. Now we can just perfectly and if he makes me mad we can zip apart!! (Jk) I’m laying in this bag while I leave a review and it’s hard not to fall asleep. My favorite is the washable liner AND the pillow pockets!!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Wildhorn products never disappoint!!
customer_reviews.text: The Wildhorn King Cove sleeping bag, like all of there other products, is of great quality and ingenious design. The sleeping bag is soft and comfortable unlike any other sleeping bag I have ever used. I love that there is a removable liner allowing for easy washing after use. Pillow storage is an amazing idea, I HATE it when my pillow falls off the edge of my air mattress during the night. Not to mention how this solves the problem said pillow ending up touching the side of the tent and getting wet. I can’t wait to go camping and try this out for real!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Decently happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Sleeps a bit too hot for me during a California summer. Good news is that it warms up quickly and I would be happy using this in the fall! For the price, the zipper could be a lot easier to pull. It’s very bulky but that’s to be expected. Quality is there, zipper could be much improved. Not sure how useful removable liner is. It’s very thick.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Sasaki

customer_reviews.title: There is so much room in the bad boy you could seriously fit 3 people in it
customer_reviews.text: I just got this last week and to try it out I decided to have a sleepover on my bed. There is so much room in the bad boy you could seriously fit 3 people in it. And i could not be live how warm it was. I loved that it can be a big cozy couple snuggle fest or 2 separate ones. The one thing I do struggle with is that I can't get it back in the bag. I spent 5 mins on it and gave up. Its almost back in on my bedroom floor. I'm sure there is a trick to it and I will fui figure it out. But over all I love it,
customer_reviews.author: Marte Sampson

customer_reviews.title: I would buy this again!
customer_reviews.text: Mind blown! Beautifully made bag. Super fluffy and warm and larger than I expected. The details are very nice as well, a very nice zipper and a cool sewn in pouch to stuff a hoodie or other clothes item into if you forgot your pillow. The picture doesn't show how cool the colors are on the inside. Not often do I feel like I buy something that is better than what I expected, so it was pleasant to buy and receive such a nice bag for the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of good money JUNK
customer_reviews.text: After using this product I wish I could get my money back. Zipper system is total garbage. You cant zipper or unzipper more then 1" without the junk catching the material. DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.author: ED Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy for two and hubby is 6'4". There was a lot of static though. I will use more fabric softner I guess.
customer_reviews.author: CATHY LEYDECKER

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. Can't wait to use it. Just got it today. Took it out. This thing is nice. Hard to get back in the bag though.
customer_reviews.author: leitning17

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: First impression: It is huge!!! We loved it!! We used it when family came to visit so the kids could sleep on it!! "It is comfortable!" was their reaction. Very well made. I am excited to keep using it!!
customer_reviews.author: Roxy R.

customer_reviews.title: Super high quality bag
customer_reviews.text: Super high quality bag. Great padding and zippers, which is really important for good sleeping bags. I also like the case that comes with it. Most bags this big require a ton of space to pack them up and take them with you. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Kent

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable, able to detach the liner only, etc (+5) This is quite bulky sleeping bag (-1)
customer_reviews.author: hjkim

customer_reviews.title: Holy AWESOME! This bag is huge
customer_reviews.text: Holy AWESOME! This bag is huge! Well made and awesome features with the removable liner and the pillow holder. Comes with a nice compression stuff sack. Finally, You can break it down to two separate bags.
customer_reviews.author: Outdoor man

customer_reviews.title: Roomy, warm bag with room for 2!
customer_reviews.text: Great sleeping bag! It has become my go-to bag for overnight and car camping trips. Great quality. extremely warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amznprchsr21

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. The material is soft and high quality and super warm. The lining is easy to remove and clean and I love the integrated pillow and flashlight pocket!
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Scurti

customer_reviews.title: Warm! Lightweight! Removable liner!
customer_reviews.text: The heater in our camper didn't work and this baby kept us warm in 20 degree weather. It's comfortable too - fabric feels nice. Even though it's big it's easy to handle because it's lightweight. My only complaint is that there isn't a zipper pull on the inside. So you have to reach outside to zip up.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I know I am the odd man out not giving 5 stars, but hear me out: 1-Not thrilled to have had to spend half an hour removing loose threads. 2-Yes the features are good, but it's all polyester! The price of this bag for an all polyester product is ludacris. Polyester is CHEAP.
customer_reviews.author: Rands

customer_reviews.title: The perfect bag for your family
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic bag, used on our latest beach excursion. We unzipped it and used it as a 2x beach blanket, large enough for four adults. It also is super convenient to unzip and use as two individual bags. It certainly is large, but compresses nicely as well. 10/10 warm, cozy and perfect for the weekend warrior couple.
customer_reviews.author: Rex

product_meta.title: Wildhorn King Cove 30°F Premium Double Sleeping Bag. Massive 86" L X 72" W, Removable Washable Interior Liner, Double to Single Conversion.
feature_bullets: DOUBLE TO SINGLE CONVERSION - The Wildhorn King Cove sleeping bag can convert from a roomy double to two twin beds. Altogether, as a California king, the double comes to 86" x 72"; as singles, each bag is 43" x 72". This spacious and adjustable sleeping bag is perfect for every camping situation.

REMOVABLE WASHABLE INTERIOR LINER - All King Cove Softex liners are not only breathable and moisture-wicking but are removable and washable. Each liner unzips to separate from the inside of the bag to be machine washed, making it much easier to enjoy that fresh linen feel on every outing without needing to clean the entire sleeping bag.

30°F TRUTEMP COMFORT RATED INSULATION - This means that we rate our sleeping bags to optimal comfort, not survival level. You will be warm and cozy at 30 degrees Fahrenheit / -1 degree Celsius. And in the chance that your King Cove gets wet, don’t fret! The insulation can still retain heat for survival. This sleeper also has a hood that can be cinched for freezing temperatures. Simply cinch the hood tight with the built-in draw-cord to reduce heat from radiating away.

RIPSTOP FOR DURABLE WEAR - The outside quilt has rugged 70D X 220T DWR Ripstop Poly for durability. This quality design on the exterior lining keeps your sleeping bag in excellent condition to ensure that it keeps up with you, no matter what the adventure is!

STYLISH DESIGN - This Wildhorn convertible sleep essential will make other people jealous of its fashionable design. The King Cove Softex liner has a modern graphic with a colorful gradient to enhance the look of this classic camp piece. Two color variations available.
